But <S%G1161><s%> they made light <S%G272>of<s%> <S%G565>it<s%>, and went their ways, <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> own <S%G68>farm<s%>, <S%G3588>another<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> <S%G1711>merchandise<s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G191>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3710>wroth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4753>armies<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5406>murderers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1714>burned<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.
